content:
@klonos - This got me checking some old issues. This one looks outdated https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/689 - can you confirm, because if I understand this one correctly, there are others like it.

[UX] Improve the help text for setting a layout page title type. 路 Issue #689 路 backdrop/backdrop-issues
I understand being able to give a title to your custom layouts, but what would be a use case example of no title? What would the benefit(s) be? Also, what is a "default title"? What happe...
^^ that one is not about blocks - it's about layout page titles.
(I'm working ATM, so can't do much work on Backdrop - will get to those eventually)
